examples.example: 我的生活已经恢复正常，一切都在有条不紊地进行着。

translate.english: My life has returned to normal, and everything is proceeding in an orderly manner.

examples.example: 尽管经历了一些波折，但现在所有事情都已经恢复正常，大家都很开心。

translate.english: Although there have been some twists and turns, now all things have returned to normal and everyone is very happy.

examples.example: 我的心情已经恢复正常，又能以积极的态度面对生活啦。

translate.english: My mood has returned to normal, and I can face life with a positive attitude again.
